title: Marshall Matters: Ignat Solzhenitsyn
description: In this inaugural episode of Marshall Matters, Winston interviews Ignat Solzhenitsyn on the pursuit of art, the state of classical music, the lasting influence of his father Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn and the thunderous (or gentle) essay ‘Live Not By Lies’...
itunes:author: The Spectator
dc:creator: The Spectator
